author: perezhilton
title: Pink Shares An Update On Her Post-Baby Weight Loss Journey — See How Much She Wants To Lose
text:
Raise Your Glass to Pink , everyone!
As you know, the 37-year-old welcomed her second child ( a little brother for five-year-old Willow !) with husband Carey Hart back in December — and now she's opening up her weight loss journey since giving birth to sweet angel , Jameson .
Related: Pink Sounds Off On Lady GaGa's Haters! 
Two weeks ago, the Just Like Fire songstress claimed she was back in the gym and was ready to start shedding some lbs. the healthy way:
